lender.name: Mags
lender.loan_because: I understand the trials and rewards of small business and relish the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I own BeauLily a company that makes TwiddlePups and TwiddleCats etc - which are products for the frail elderly, particularly those with Alzheimer's and dementia.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I understand the passion and sacrifice that it takes to be an entrepreneur in the best of circumstances. It's a natural compliment to my professional life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs in the United States and assist them in obtaining loans for their businesses. My focus is on small businesses.

lender.name: Asghar
lender.loan_because: I need to.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: SOS Children's Villages gave me the opportunity to have a new family, aspirations and more importantly, a more widen perspective of possibilities that are possible in this world. An EXAMPLE is working to improve the life style of other fellows in different parts of this world. If you want to be part of a group that wants to help people around the globe, contact me at montwi01@luther.edu
lender.occupational_info: I have a work-study plan at Luther College. That means I study and work to pay what isn't covered in my scholarship. I am from Colombia and grew up at a SOS Chilldren's Village in Ibague, Colombia. So my work is at the welcome desk of Luther College and at the Oneota Market in Luther College as well.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and I understand it is difficult starting a new business.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are our lifeblood to any industry or business. It is Creative Intelligence at it's finest.
lender.occupational_info: I am a co-owner of the Teddy Bear Bed and Breakfast in Bancroft, Ontario, Canada. We are in the hospitality business. We can accommodate up to 14 people. Our guests stay overnight and we feed them a full breakfast. Our guests can enjoy our lake, do a meditative walk through our labyrinth or relax on our deck.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Having owned a bussiness with my brother, being a single parent, I know how difficult it can be. I feel if i can help another human being in some small way, help them keep their dream alive, bring a smile, then life is good and I've touched someones life in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: Touch is powerful. I love what I do, being able to help people feel and function better with massage, reiki and cranio sacral therapy.

lender.loan_because: i believe in microcredit
lender.occupational_info: i work in a library for a university library and also design websites and publications

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: I want to get rich. Wait, maybe this isn't the site for me....
lender.occupational_info: Filmmaking

lender.name: mamatoto
lender.loan_because: I loan because of that saying, "We only protect what we love, we only love what we know, we only know what we are taught." I will find the person who belongs to that quote and post it later.
lender.occupational_info: I have fun with the kids staying at the Great Wolf Lodge in Grapevine, Texas.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working on improving their lives
lender.occupational_info: I care for adults who have serious illnesses, to focus on comfort and quality of life

lender.name: Nico!
lender.loan_because: Instead of blowing my money on gambling and drinking I donate it here. The money that goes into this account will never come out. It will just keep circulating. I'd rather have someone have a roof over their head instead of myself having a drink.

lender.name: FaithfulServant
lender.loan_because: I have because God gave it to me.
lender.occupational_info: I counsel people with auto loans

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing wealth - if I'm not using it and someone else needs it in the meantime, you're welcome to it!

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that in order to eliminate poverty we all have to lend a little.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: others have helped me during my lifetime to start a business. I want to return the opportunity to others.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a pilot, a lawyer, a book store owner, and a teacher

lender.name: Brent Lundeen

lender.loan_because: I want to be helpful.

lender.occupational_info: I look for opportunities that will produce a benefit for the neighborhood in which the borrower lives. Building a sustainable future for the enterpreneur and for those in their broader community is an important consideration.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I have a personal moral responsibility to help others. Free markets are the most efficient way to lift people out of poverty and provide them with a better quality of life. Kiva is a perfect model of free markets and charity working together.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites and marketing materials.

lender.name: Urs

lender.occupational_info: Every day,engagement for a better world. Specifically, development aid and realisation of microcredits services in Africa. (www.learningforlife.ch)

lender.name: Fil

lender.occupational_info: My business, Pink Elephant Communications, helps people make a living doing what they love. We help entrepreneurs to market themselves in a way that feels good.

lender.name: Jeanne and Bob
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to make a big difference in one person's life.
lender.occupational_info: We teach college - English as a Second Language and Organization Development. Jeanne is also a consultant.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: the best gift one can give, is to help another succeed.

lender.name: Cheryl Howard
lender.loan_because: I desire to "make a difference in the world and believe the concept of micro-financing can help those living in poverty help themselves and their family.

lender.name: Federico
lender.loan_because: One person CAN make a difference to help improve the lives of women in developing countries. Women's economic empowerment is key to women's equality.

lender.name: Leif
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I loan to help women develop their skills!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Money makes the world go 'round

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: the best aid is not a donation but an investment. I dont want to be your nice guy who gives money, but your investment partner. I want to know what you do and how you make my money work for you.
lender.occupational_info: I help financial firms improve their business.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I think it's one of the best ways to help people, as it's very sustainable and encourages community building.
lender.occupational_info: I am a research assistant at an international development think tank in Washington DC. I also have taught business and enterprise courses in Kigali, Rwanda.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: People could use some more trust and help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children how to read and write in a Montessori school.

lender.name: Garrick
lender.loan_because: I believe that ethical capitalism is the most effective tool available for improving the lives of the world's poor.

lender.name: Gregory Paul Johnson
lender.loan_because: Since 1983, I've really enjoyed growing my own technology consulting business. I learned the skills of managing a successful business from my Mother. I'd like others to have an opportunity to gain education, experience, and build a business of their own. As the economy in the United States continues to decline, I feel my money is safer being loaned in small amounts to people around the world. I'd rather my money be with an elderly woman who runs a small shop or herds sheep, than to be in some mutual fund or with some broker on Wall Street.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of the ResourcesForLife.com website and a full-time technology support specialist. I also help facilitate the Small House Society - an organization dedicated to promoting smaller and simpler living.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It's good for the world
lender.occupational_info: I help folks by providing medication and sharing my healthcare knowledge by working as a retail pharmacist

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: So whether you eat or drink or whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God

lender.name: Ursula Street
lender.loan_because: microcredit is incredibly good public health.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand how and why diseases move in a population.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: I believe money is a living energy and must be considered and used the most sacred way possible

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: it is akin to planting a seed...
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a university student studying in California, USA. I am married to a wonderful woman and we would like to someday own our own land to grow crops and raise livestock on.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way...

lender.name: Catie
lender.loan_because: I know that people all over the world have the ability to work- they just need the means!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a project to establish a women's university in SE Asia.

lender.name: Moe
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and give back to the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Education. I teach Business and Finance to college students.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
lender.occupational_info: receive calls from individuals who need assistance and activate the services necessary to respond to the nature of the call for help (i.e. Firefighters, Police Officers, and Emergency Medical Services).

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: we all have the power to change the world if we choose too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home father and spend my time raising our 2 year old, Jack

lender.name: Chris Hanisco
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become self-sufficient. Being an entrepreneur is very rewarding and I want others to know that feeling. I hope that someday, borrowers will help others in need once they get established.

lender.name: Genevieve
lender.loan_because: i'm paying it forward.

lender.name: Minneapolis Rotaract
lender.loan_because: Being a group interested in professional development and service within the community, we feel that this is a great way to lend a hand to those striving to do the same in their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of young professionals from the Minneapolis, MN area. We have members working in a variety of fields. As a group, we focus on community service, professional and leadership development, and fellowship.

lender.name: Wajdi
lender.loan_because: None of us can can get through life without a little help.

lender.name: the dan and myla show
lender.loan_because: "it never hurts to help".

lender.name: Garett
lender.loan_because: Like Henry Ford did a century before I was born, I want to change the way that people can live their lives, through sea change in transportation, earnings, and leading a meaningful life.
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage detailed solutions that impact transportation of goods, services, and people around the world.

lender.name: dsfasd
lender.loan_because: cash flow needs to be established between enthusiastic people who is in need
lender.occupational_info: I play guitar to kids with no sense of touch

lender.name: Sumi
lender.loan_because: It is not a level playing field.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to help someone, to make their life a little easier.

lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to encourage entrepreneurship and raise equality in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a doctoral student in Stockholm.

lender.name: lessthanthree
lender.loan_because: dinosaurs go rawr.

lender.name: Yaya
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the act of helping others.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: Economic growth leads to so many positive things, including increased personal freedoms, cultural improvments and ultimately a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I set up, run and maintain an industrial printing press (~8 meters long, ~3 meters high).

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: So many people have helped me that I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I study at a university

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: helping people start or expand their own businesses is a respectful and intelligent way to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big arts centre, writing many of the flyers and brochures we make. We have big orchestras come to play and I put together the programmes we sell. I also play the cello and the flute in amateur orchestras.

lender.name: Fredrik Eliasson
lender.loan_because: I believe this form of entrepreneurial support is the best way to empower people and to incite a change towards something better
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping companies to do the right thing and to do things right (simply put, and in that order)

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to help. We should help when we can!
lender.occupational_info: I help the sales people asnwer the technical questions there might be in a sales call.

lender.name: Zo
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the right to provide for themselves and their family and I think microfinance is a wonderful way of helping people to do so.

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Self employed organizer, declutterer!

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: It's so much better than just giving money away, for both parts. It can make a difference in other people's lives without paternalism, and it encourages entrepeneur rather than passive self-pity attitudes. It's things like this that really make the world go forward.

lender.name: Cate
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you wish to see in the world" ~Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I receive more than I give
lender.occupational_info: Soy un curador del corazn

lender.name: Moving up the Mountain
lender.loan_because: I know the feeling in my own life of one person offering assistance, and when many like minds and good hearts with good intentions come together, we can empower people one life at a time. It is possible! And with Kiva, we see our good intentions come to life!
lender.occupational_info: The painting on my page is called "Moving up the Mountain" is about the dreams we hold inside, to make life better. They come from our heart and spirits, our gifts and talents. With belief and support we can each make small movements up our own mountains. Fingers of light reach upwards, offering support of dreams, our collective dreams for a better life. May we all live well and fulfill our dreams!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I love being a Kiva lender because I can invest in people all over the world. I believe that people, if given the opportunity, can lift themselves up to help themselves, the community and their families. Also, after the initial investment of cash, I can now just take the money being paid back and put it to work again with another loan.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that coordinates music festivals for elementary, middle, and high school bands, choirs and orchestras. I write press releases, various public relations material, grant proposals, and during the spring I assist in the coordination of the actual festivals.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: its good to have somewhere to turn to.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves for long term improvement in living standards for present and future generations. And it's the least I can do in this life. This is an awesome non-profit model.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it only takes a little to make a big difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I design heating and air conditioning systems for large buildings.

lender.name: Property Management
lender.loan_because: i am kind and generous to all kind of people as long as they pay back the loan i will reloan out to people

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: Jesus says that one must give to the poor; this lets me to it more efficiently. Jesus sagt "man mut zum Witwen und Waisen geben". Diesen Program lasst mir mehr effizient geben.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, and also a supervisor at FedEx. Ich bin Student, und auch Chef bei Fedex.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: its a small but effective way that I can help others

lender.name: Giff
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and how entrepreneurs of all kinds need to help each other. I loan because once you have children, you understand the power of helping people take care of their own.
lender.occupational_info: In the work part of my life, I help start and build technology companies.

lender.name: Imo
lender.occupation: Teacher helper of chiIdren in Hand work
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and I do side small business of Charcaol selling after work. But I earn a small income to sustain my family. I believe that if I get a kiva Loan I will Expand to a bigger bussines. I can sell one bag in the evening earnig a profit of 2$

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I travelled a lot around south-east Asia and always wanted to help those in need. I thought that only by giving out money would not be of much help but only temporarely helping. So Kiva gives us this great opportunity to help in a way that will improve the life of many and hopefully for a long time. This alternative has an awesome impact and I want to be part of it !
lender.occupational_info: I graduated from University in International Business. I wish you all good luck with your own business!

lender.name: lena
lender.loan_because: I like supporting people to be successful and to improve their lives.

lender.name: Mr. Madison
lender.occupation: Md Star Of mercy Loan Firm

lender.name: Phoebe
lender.loan_because: I believe that people have needs, and this is my way of meeting a smal need of someone.

lender.name: chuck steak sandwich
lender.loan_because: there's a cute lil girl on our group page that told me to, man I can't let her down just look at her LOOK AT THAT CUTE KID

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help others fulfill their goals.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I can finally put my money where my mouth is, and it isn't just a handout.

lender.name: Dave
lender.occupational_info: Teaching

lender.name: Leszard
lender.loan_because: It moves my imagination, it is "globalization" I like and would like to support.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: The Jesuits showed me the value of social justice to me during my education. Lifting others out of poverty and empowering them is among the highest callings.

lender.name: Herve
lender.loan_because: It is the simplest way to help a motivated individual achieve their goals. It is also great to be able to reach so far and so easily.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entertainment consultant working in the field of aquatics

lender.name: Jacqueline Hope
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to not have enough, and to try to be creative in order to make things work. Seminary alone was an exercise in poverty! I love that Kiva allows me to loan small amounts, which is important given I still do not make a lot of money and am paying back my own student loans. I value how I can join others to make a difference--it is all not up to me, but I can be a part of something big all the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am an ordained Protestant minister in the United Church of Christ. I have never worked as the pastor of a church though. My work has been focused on helping people of all faiths--and lack thereof--in health care settings when they face the crisis of injury or illness. Not only do I know a great deal about the many faith paths, but also a lot about helping people narrate meaning even in the midst of terrible pain, i.e. re-writing their story so the end is not just loss. I am a HUGE believer in healing, even when cure is not possible, and this belief is the cornerstone of all my work. I am shifting in my path towards working more with women in difficult circumstances. I also write about my work and life on my website.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in a country where I have my business and enjoy living in.
lender.occupational_info: I macro manage my business thanks to a very efficient manager that runs my Bagel Cafe for me. This now gives me time to dedicate to researching and getting involved in efficiently making a difference in the world. Its a work in progress...

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: one small loan is a small yet powerful step to educating entreprenuers who wish to succeed and help fight world poverty.

lender.name: Susie and Helen
lender.loan_because: we want to help

lender.name: JRobere
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write engineering computer software.

lender.loan_because: when we help each other, we become more connected for life.
lender.occupational_info:
Member of the Global Brain working for more synergy based on our global consciousness.
http://gbasetup.ning.com/

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I've got a gorgeous wife, 4 lovely kids and a job that pleases me ... so why should I not give others some start-up assistance?
lender.occupational_info: Selling the know-how of my dear engineering colleagues to other companies for their product developments

lender.name: David Chan
lender.loan_because: With a little help, we can all become better.
lender.occupational_info: I work to bring ideas from everyday life and business on to the internet.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Eating well is one of the most basic and important foundations for quality of life. I want to do what I can to extend the possibility for others to be able to have access to good, healthy, food.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their lives and health by working with how and what they eat.

lender.name: ANGELIQUE
lender.loan_because: You are giving these people a chance to make better lives for themselves and their families who may otherwise be unable to find traditional funding for their endeavors.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I believe that this site is just the greatest idea! I love that I can help someone on the other side of the planet and know that all the money is going directly to those that need it.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of assisting hard working people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in the buying and selling of condomiuniums.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think people deserve better chances in life and I want to help give them those chances.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and because I see how much it can affect the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying finance and volunteering until spring when I might start a business teaching people about personal finance and good money management skills.

lender.name: Paul Hugs
lender.loan_because: time is short and I'd like to make the most of what I can do.
lender.occupational_info: looking to do my part to create a community who do what they can to promote good. I also volunteer with an international exchange program for 18-40 year olds that involves 14 countries coming together for 2 months on a ship. More info at www.swyusa.org if you want to apply. Seeking good people to represent the U.S.

lender.name: Karissa
lender.loan_because: i love my sister
lender.occupational_info: i don't

Now We want to export fresh grapes from INDIA TO UAE. For the same rerasons we need a huge fund 77800$. This amount will be refunded within six months. This fund will also help all of us nine persons to grow economically stronger as well as it will help India to gain more Dollars.
lender.occupational_info: Export

lender.name: Keryn
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to be able to work and provide for themselves....
lender.occupational_info: Creating beautiful handmade stationery

lender.name: Tim Pratt & Family
lender.loan_because: If we can help third world countries kick start their economies, it is certain that their standard of living will rise. Every little bit helps, and KIVA is an excellent way of seeing a measurable impact of how you can help - however small it may be.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging at times, but overall i love it because i have always been numerically orientated and systematic in my approach to things. Accounting gives me an opportunity to grow.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur too.

lender.name: Matej
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help this way.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers to do useful work.

lender.occupational_info: Caring for sick children in the hospital.

lender.name: Dr Elizabeth J
lender.loan_because: I am priviledged to be achieving my goals in life and feel it important to give back to society. What better way than to help other achieve their goals?

lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others no matter how small that help may be.
lender.occupational_info: I create maps for various companies and organizations for different purposes.

lender.loan_because: I can.

It doesn't take much to change a person's outlook on life and I'd like to help people realize their goals -- even if it may take a little progression at a time.
I may not be rich but I can afford $25.
Mabuhay!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the security industry but I have a passion for interior design.

lender.occupational_info: I ship various goods and products internationally via Airfreight.

lender.loan_because: i need to buy Computers, Printers and other Business gadgets to start my personal computer Graphics Business to support myself and my children.
lender.occupational_info: I m generally a computer software man, but more biased in Computer Graphics, Desktop Publishing and Website Designing. i m definitely sure i will be successful in this business, becuase over the years i ve monopolize myself into the only computer genuis that can use normal graphic applications like coreldraw to develop a complicated geological or administrative map in my vicinity.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I know that I'm fortunate and I would like to lend a helping hand to those who want a chance to make their lives better.

lender.loan_because: To do our part to heal the wounds caused by genocides around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a class of students who have been learning about genocide and were inspired to set an example of good will.

lender.name: STEVE
lender.occupational_info: i play the trumpet
